game.settings.ragnaroks-lobby.lobbyActiv: When enabled, prevents all players from accessing the world and displays a maintenance message. The lobby state persists across reloads until toggled off.
game.messages.ragnaroks-lobby.maintenanc: The world is currently undergoing maintenance. Please stand by while the Game Master prepares for the next session. Access will be restored shortly.

game.notifications.ragnaroks-lobby.error: An error occurred while toggling the lobby.
